      • ComboBoxCellEditor

        Combo box used as a table cell editor class constructor
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • stopCellEditing

        public boolean stopCellEditing()
        Override so that calls to stop editing can be intercepted and disabled. This is necessary to allow the combo box item matching to operate in a table cell the same way it operates in a data field
        Specified by:
        stopCellEditing in interface javax.swing.CellEditor
        Overrides:
        stopCellEditing in class javax.swing.DefaultCellEditor

      • allowCellEdit

        protected void allowCellEdit(boolean enable)
        Set the flag that determines if calls to stop cell editing are allowed to proceed. This is necessary to allow the combo box item matching to operate in a table cell the same way it operates in a data field
        Parameters:
        enable - true to allow calls to stopCellEditing() to proceed normally

      • updateSelectedItem

        protected void updateSelectedItem()
        Update the combo box's selected item to the currently highlighted list item. This is used by the keyboard handler when the Enter key is pressed so that the cell reflects the selected item
